Author: deadby21haha
Text: Ugh it happens and it sucks so bad :(   Wishing you the best

Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: I’m sorry that you’re living with so much pain and struggle. <3   For me the hair-trigger crying, the everything seeming overwhelming, the feelings of hopelessness and helplessness are all symptoms of my mental health struggles (particularly depression).    Eventually I reached out for help, and then eventually I found help that’s helping me. For years things only ever got worse and darker...but I have some hope now.
